name: AzureServiceBus
friendlyName: Post a message to Azure Service Bus
description: Post a message to Azure Service Bus from a build or release pipeline
author: Peter Groenewegen

inputs.name: QueueName
inputs.label: Queue/Topic name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the queue or topic

inputs.name: IsMooncake
inputs.label: Is mooncake (China)
inputs.helpMarkDown: True if you are in china, changes the service bus url to https://serviceBusNamespace.servicebus.chinacloudapi.cn/queueName

inputs.name: SenderKeyName
inputs.label: Sender key name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sender key name for sending messages

inputs.name: Message
inputs.label: Message
inputs.helpMarkDown: Message to post to the queue

inputs.name: CustomMessageProperties
inputs.label: Custom message properties
inputs.helpMarkDown: Custom message properties sent along with header. Key-value pairs separated by semicolon, e.g. key1=value1;key2=value2
